description: Unauthorized access breach triggers discovery and assessment notification process
Lost device breach triggers breach notification process
Phishing attack breach triggers risk assessment notification process
Ransomware infection breach triggers notification process
Email transmission breach triggers notification planning process
Data disposal breach triggers individual notification process
SQL injection breach triggers media notification process
Misdirected fax breach triggers documentation process
Insider threat breach triggers complete notification process
Cloud misconfiguration breach triggers HHS notification process
Unattended workstation breach triggers assessment process
Third-party breach triggers investigation and notification
